Introduction
This topic contains general information on forfeiture of benefits, including information on
38 U.S.C. forfeiture provisions
38 CFR forfeiture provisions
forfeiture for subversive activities compared to forfeiture for treasonable acts
corporate flash for forfeiture cases
, and
jurisdiction over forfeiture determinations
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B  - Forfeiture of Benefits
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B
